text: Members of the Thozhilalar Viduthalai Munnani affiliated to the Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi (VCK) staged a demonstration near the Anna Statue in the city on Friday condemning honour killings in the state, especially the recent murder of Dalit youth Shankar at Udumalpet. The agitators demanded the enactment of a separate legislation to prevent honour killings. Prabakaran, state vice president of the Munnani, led the agitation.
title: Demonstration
